background.endsPattern: ^.*(Worker process started and initialized|Host lock lease acquired by instance ID).*$
Local tunnel service is started successfully

fx-extension.developCopilotPlugin.markdownDescription: Enable to develop Copilot plugin (Reload Visual Studio Code after changing this setting to take effect). Get more info from [How to Extend Microsoft 365 Copilot](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-copilot-plugin).

fx-extension.logLevel.markdownDescription:
Set the log level of Teams Toolkit. The default value is `Info`. The available values are `Debug`, `Verbose`, `Info`. The definitions of the log levels are:

`Debug`:

- HTTP request and response details from Teams Toolkit to external services such as Azure, Microsoft 365, and Teams Developer Portal.
- Information related to Microsoft 365 and Azure accounts and access permissions.
- Debugging information for each Teams Toolkit command execution, such as stack trace, ARM deployment information, etc.

`Verbose`:

- Progress information when executing lifecycle commands defined in the YAML file.
- Execution details of each action that defined in the YAML file, including outcomes, result summaries, diagnostic information, etc.

`Info`: Teams Toolkit command execution summaries.

fx-extension.enableMicrosoftKiota.markdownDescription: Use Microsoft Kiota to generate an API Plugin from a local OpenAPI description or search for public APIs. If Microsoft Kiota isn't installed, install it from the [Visual Studio Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-graph.kiota)

scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run vite && node esbuild.mjs --production
scripts.build: npm run check-types && npm run vite && node esbuild.mjs
